name: Eat (EatOfficialAccount)
description:
Eat is a game about a cannibal who's urge to eat insatiable. To know what your current hunger is, look at the hunger bar. it starts at 0% and every 0.6 seconds it goes up by 10% if your hunger bar reaches 100%, you will gain a speed boost. If your hunger stays at 100% for 2 seconds then you will go insane from hunger(game over). There are two people, eating one person will decrease your hunger by 20%. if a person witnesses you eating another person they will run to the exit. If they make to the exit then you cant eat them. You can only eat somone if their within a certain distance.

PC Controls: 

Move:The character will follow your mouse.

Eat:Space Bar

Mobile Controls:

Move:The character will follow your finger.

Eat:Tap on the person you want to eat.

v0.0

This game is still in early development so please expect bugs/glitches.
